      • fastLowerCaseWord

        public void fastLowerCaseWord()
        If the first char of instance variable 'word' begins with an ASCII-8 upper case char, replace that first char with its lower case equivalent. Hopefully this is faster than something like word.substring(0,1).toUpperCase() + word.substring(1); Since strings are immutable, we still create a new string object here. NOTE: this will not work with unicode.

      • setWord

        public void setWord(java.lang.String newWord)
        Setter/Getter for instance var 'word'. Only available so that unit tests can ensure proper functioning of fastLowerCaseWord();
        Parameters:
        newWord -
